Mesa Configuration ToolÂ¶

THIS REPO IS BEING DEPRECIATED DUE TO LACK OF USE BY THE LINUXCNC COMMUNITY.

The Mesa Configuration Tool creates LinuxCNC configuration files for 5i25, 6i25, 7i76e, 7i80db, 7i80hd, 7i92, 7i93, 7i95, 7i96, 7i96S, 7i97 and 7i98.
